items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can’t go wrong. Beautiful and comfortable sweater dress.
items.body: I’m 5’6”, 145lbs, 34b and bought size M. Really like the flattering knit design. Of course it’s all one color but the pattern/lines of the knit stitching emphasize a feminine shape more than other knit dresses that just have straight vertical rib-lines. What’s important to me is that it naturally comes in at the waist and isn’t over stretched at the hips. I can opt to wear a belt or not, both options look good. The fabric is a medium winter weight and opaque. A “spanx” type slip underneath keeps everything smooth. The dress holds its original shape very well! I can wear the it 3-4x before washing and returning it back to its pre-stretched shape. Wash and dry it gently to keep fabric from pilling. I don’t over-heat in this dress. But I don’t dance in it either! It’s comfortable, classic, kinda sexy. Read more
items.author: Juliann

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Anrabess Ribbed Midi Sweater Dress
items.body: Dress arrived well packaged and in new, unworn condition. No odor was detected upon removal from the shrink pack bag. The color is really beautiful and exactly what I wanted. The ribbing is perfect, not too wide. The fabric is definitely not thin. I consider it a medium weight, not see through. I love the detail at the neck and on the bodice . The fit is snug for sure but it is a body con dress and it does stretch. I expected this dress would be more of a maxi since I'm 5'3.5. It's just a bit shorter than I expected but I can deal with that. The sleeve length is perfect for once. I laundered the dress in cold water and dried it briefly, hung it still very damp. The fold lines were slightly visible. After it dries, I will iron it on a warm setting. I am confident that this will be effective. This lovely dress is stylish and well made. The photos don't do it justice. Read more
items.author: Kin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy it now!!!
items.body: Very well made! Comfortable and luxe look! Color as advertised! Bang for your buck! True to size. No smell! Read more
items.author: Bargain$4mommy

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sweater Dress
items.body: The fabric is good weight not thin at all, It has some stretch. The ribbing is sweater like material, very soft. Please with this purchase. Have bought other colors in the past. Read more
items.author: evon

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!!!!
items.body: Love, Love, Love this dress. Just came back and ordered 3 more. I'm 5'6" and weight 148 lbs. The Medium fit me perfectly. Ordered brown originally and came back for the blue/green, royal blue and pink. Very comfortable. Can be dressed up or keep it casual, depending on the shoes. Great price too. Nice solid fabric and very soft Read more
items.author: Phoebe

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sweater Dress
items.body: I’ve purchased multiple dresses on Amazon and this one is by far my favorite. Great quality and looks amazing on. Runs true to size. Read more
items.author: Jennifer S.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect fall dress
items.body: This dress is a fall favorite! It’s beautifully form-fitting without being too tight, and the fabric has just the right amount of stretch. The length is perfect — not too short, not too long — and it pairs effortlessly with boots and a light jacket. I love how confident and put-together I feel in it. It’s cozy enough for cooler days but still breathable. Definitely a staple in my autumn wardrobe! Read more
items.author: Mila

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Awful quality - ripped collar seam when putting on dress
items.body: Upon putting on the dress for the first time, the neck collar seam of the dress completed came apart and is no longer wearable. I can’t imagine how this could happen other than sub-par stitching of this dress. I don’t know if the one I received was a lemon or not but this shows that the company has poor quality control standards. It’s very unfortunate because the sweater dress is beautiful with nice high quality material. I would like to receive my money back for this item and request that the seller contact me. Read more
items.author: Nancy Kim

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Rust, Blue, Hot Pink, Black, Dusty Blue, Green Blue, Olive, Red, Wine Red, Almond, Pink, White, Beige. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
